message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I understand you were thinking of $900000, but I'm afraid I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1050000. This is my final offer for now.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $950000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $1020000. This is as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $1000000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $1050000, but that's as low as I can go. I'm starting to think that maybe we're not on the same page. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
